mapper.select: SELECT O.ORDER_NUMBER, O.ORDER_TOTAL, O.ORDER_DATE, O.ORDER_STATUS, P.PRODUCT_NUMBER, PRODUCT_NAME, I.PRODUCT_IMG_NUMBER, I.PRODUCT_IMG_NAME, I.PRODUCT_IMG_UPLOAD_PATH, I.PRODUCT_IMG_UUID FROM TBL_ORDER O JOIN TBL_ORDER_PRODUCT OP ON O.USER_NUMBER = #{userNumber} AND O.ORDER_NUMBER = OP.ORDER_NUMBER JOIN TBL_PRODUCT P ON OP.PRODUCT_NUMBER = P.PRODUCT_NUMBER JOIN TBL_PRODUCT_IMG I ON P.PRODUCT_NUMBER = I.PRODUCT_NUMBER

SELECT O.ORDER_NUMBER, O.ORDER_TOTAL, O.ORDER_DATE, O.ORDER_STATUS,O.ORDER_REQ, O.ORDER_NAME, O.ORDER_TEL, P.PRODUCT_NUMBER, PRODUCT_NAME, I.PRODUCT_IMG_NUMBER, I.PRODUCT_IMG_NAME, I.PRODUCT_IMG_UPLOAD_PATH, I.PRODUCT_IMG_UUID, S.SHOP_CATEGORY_NUMBER, S.SHOP_CATEGORY_NAME, U.USER_NUMBER, U.USER_EMAIL, U.USER_PHONE_NUMBER, U.USER_ADDRESS, OP.ORDER_PRODUCT_PRICE FROM TBL_ORDER O JOIN TBL_ORDER_PRODUCT OP ON O.ORDER_NUMBER = #{orderNumber} AND O.ORDER_NUMBER = OP.ORDER_NUMBER JOIN TBL_PRODUCT P ON OP.PRODUCT_NUMBER = P.PRODUCT_NUMBER JOIN ( SELECT PRODUCT_IMG_NUMBER, PRODUCT_IMG_NAME, PRODUCT_IMG_UPLOAD_PATH, PRODUCT_IMG_UUID, PRODUCT_NUMBER, RK FROM ( SELECT PRODUCT_IMG_NUMBER, PRODUCT_IMG_NAME, PRODUCT_IMG_UPLOAD_PATH, PRODUCT_IMG_UUID, PRODUCT_NUMBER, RANK() over (PARTITION BY PRODUCT_NUMBER ORDER BY PRODUCT_IMG_NUMBER) RK FROM TBL_PRODUCT_IMG ) WHERE RK=1 ) I ON P.PRODUCT_NUMBER = I.PRODUCT_NUMBER JOIN TBL_SHOP_CATEGORY S ON S.SHOP_CATEGORY_NUMBER = P.SHOP_CATEGORY_NUMBER JOIN TBL_USER U ON U.USER_NUMBER = O.ORDER_NUMBER
